Toggle Menu



Code of Ordinances
==================

![](https://sansabatexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/codes-ordinances-1024x674.jpg)

Our Local Laws & Regulations
----------------------------

**Code of ordinances refers to the local laws and regulations enacted by a city or municipality. These ordinances cover a wide range of topics, including zoning, building codes, noise control, parking regulations, and other aspects of daily life.**

**The City of San Saba Codes of Ordinances & Appendix includes legislation through Ord. No. 2024-02 adopted March 12, 2024.**

[View San Saba Code of Ordinances & Appendix](https://ecode360.com/SA6472)

| [Download Code Enforcement-Agreement for Interconnection & Parallel Operation of Distributed Generation in the San Saba Electrical System](https://sansabatexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/code-agreement-interconnection.pdf "Download Code Enforcement-Agreement for Interconnection & Parallel Operation of Distributed Generation in the San Saba Electrical System") |

Visitor’s Center

Hours of Operation

Friday: 7:30am – 11:30am
